Constructor function for Milne pitch-class spectrum

dot-milne_pc_spectrum.Rd

This function constructs a "milne_pc_spectrum" object.

.milne_pc_spectrum(x)

Arguments

x

A numeric vector of pitch-class weights, typically (but not necessarily) of length 1200.

Value

An object of class "milne_pc_spectrum".

See also

milne_pc_spectrum.
